Class RaceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.race_results.RaceList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class RaceList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    creates a list of races does not have a particular order
    Author:
    William
